name: Add new Airtable records as subscribers in MailerLite
description: Effortlessly grow your email list by connecting Airtable and MailerLite. This template automatically adds new records from your Airtable base as subscribers in MailerLite, ensuring that your marketing efforts are always up-to-date with the latest contacts. Simply set up your Airtable with the necessary fields for subscriber information, and watch as new entries seamlessly integrate into your MailerLite subscriber list, enhancing your email marketing campaigns.
